title: Create JHA for Roofing Work
description: A safety officer must create a Job Hazard Analysis (JHA) for the upcoming roofing installation.

tasks.description: Identify the primary hazards associated with roofing work, such as 'Falls from height', 'Material handling', and 'Heat exposure'.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent lists the key hazards for the JHA.

tasks.description: For the 'Falls from height' hazard, specify the preventative measure as 'Mandatory use of personal fall arrest systems (PFAS) for all workers'.
tasks.expected_outcome: A specific, actionable control measure is documented for a key hazard.
